service.query: SELECT (SELECT ORG_SHORT_NAME FROM DPS.PC_ORGMST WHERE ORG_CD = SUBSTR(X.ORG_CD, 1, 4) || '000000') AS STR_CD , NVL(BRAND_CD, ' ') AS BRAND_CD , NVL(BRAND_NM, ' ') AS BRAND_NM , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , ( SELECT ORG_SHORT_NAME FROM DPS.PC_ORGMST WHERE ORG_CD = SUBSTR(X.ORG_CD, 1, 6) || '0000') AS TEAM_ORG_NAME , PC_CD , ( SELECT ORG_SHORT_NAME FROM DPS.PC_ORGMST WHERE ORG_CD = SUBSTR(X.ORG_CD, 1, 8) || '00') AS PC_ORG_NAME , PUMBUN_CD , PUMBUN_NAME , MG_RATE , SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , NVL((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CUST_NO) FROM DPS.PS_DAYCUST WHERE SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PUMBUN_CD = X.PUMBUN_CD),0) AS CUST_COUNT , NVL(SUM(CUST_SALE_AMT),0) AS CUST_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(CUST_SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT)*100),2) END AS CUST_RATE FROM (SELECT B.STR_CD , NVL(BRD.BRAND_CD, ' ') AS BRAND_CD , NVL(BRD.BRAND_NM, ' ') AS BRAND_NM , B.DEPT_CD , B.TEAM_CD , SUBSTR(F.SALE_ORG_CD, 1, 8) AS ORG_CD , B.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , F.PUMBUN_NAME , A.MG_RATE , CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CUST.CUST_NO) = 0 THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE (SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT)/COUNT(DISTINCT CUST.CUST_NO)) END AS TOT_SALE_AMT -- 20180322 TOT_SALE_AMT >> NORM_SALE_AMT 로 수정(할인 반영) , (SUM(CUST.SALE_AMT + (CUST.RETURN_AMT*2))/COUNT(DISTINCT A.PUMMOK_CD)) AS CUST_SALE_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYMGPBN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , DPS.PC_PBNMST PBN , DPS.PC_BRDMST BRD , DPS.PS_DAYCUST CUST WHERE F.SALE_ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = F.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND PBN.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND BRD.BRAND_CD (+)= PBN.BRAND_CD AND B.STR_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND CUST.PUMBUN_CD(+) = A.PUMBUN_CD AND A.SALE_DT >= ? AND A.SALE_DT <= ? AND CUST.SALE_DT(+) = A.SALE_DT AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY B.STR_CD , BRD.BRAND_CD , BRD.BRAND_NM , SUBSTR(F.SALE_ORG_CD, 1, 8) , B.DEPT_CD , B.TEAM_CD , B.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.SALE_DT , F.PUMBUN_NAME , A.MG_RATE ) X GROUP BY ORG_CD , BRAND_CD , BRAND_NM , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , PUMBUN_CD , PUMBUN_NAME , MG_RATE ORDER BY STR_CD,DECODE(SUBSTR(X.ORG_CD,1,4),'0104',NULL,SUBSTR(X.ORG_CD,1,4)) NULLS LAST,(SELECT SORT_ORDER FROM DPS.PC_ORGMST M WHERE M.ORG_CD = X.ORG_CD||'00')
